LanguageData.ShowHair.HairThatWillHideHats: Hair That All Hats Will Hide
LanguageData.ShowHair.AnyAllTooltip: This toggles whether one of the checked/unchecked conditions must match/not match, or if all of them must match/not match
LanguageData.ShowHair.DropdownTooltip: Determines whether hat, hairs and beards are hidden when conditions match.
LanguageData.ShowHair.AddSettingEntryTooltip: Setting entries are evaluated from top to bottom, using the display options from the first matching entry.
LanguageData.ShowHair.ConditionsTooltip: If the checkbox is checked, then the condition must be true (e.g. pawn is drafted if drafted is checked) for this entry to apply. If the checkbox is unchecked, then the condition must be false (e.g. pawn is undrafted if drafted is unchecked) for this entry to apply. If the checkbox is yellow, then the condition is not checked for this entry. (e.g. for drafted it will apply whether or not the pawn is drafted.) LEAVE ALL OF THEM YELLOW IF YOU WANT THIS ENTRY TO ALWAYS APPLY.
